basis: The user only stated an intention to log after dinner and place the phone for two taps; there is no evidence of actual logging or eating action in this turn.
cognitive_dissonance: No explicit internal conflict detected; user expresses readiness and intent to follow through.
negative_thought_patterns: No clear self-defeating beliefs or guilt observed; BED is acknowledged but not framed as insurmountable.
emotional_triggers: Meal context and BED concerns may influence motivation; no acute distress signals in this snippet.
coaching_notes: Maintain supportive, non-pressuring tone; validate the plan while normalizing occasional non-execution. In the next session, explore any barriers to performing the post-meal log and reinforce quick, two-tap logging as a reliable routine. Consider adding a gentle check-in if the action was not completed within a specified timeframe.
